item.title: Useful Steam Deck Resources
item.description: UPDATED:8-26-2022 I finally received my Valve Steam Deck. There are lots of cool tidbits out there already so I will likely not be creating any content about itâ€”unless I decide to turn it into a hypervisor or something cool like that! Here are a couple of useful resources I have found and used pertaining to the Steam Deck: protondb - Allows you to search games to see if they are compatible with GNU/Linux or Steam Deck.
